root.name: Magic Wand
root.description:
Magic Wand tool (2D) Move right while maintaining left mouse button down to increase value tolerance. Move down while maintaining left mouse button down to increase gradient tolerance. Gradient tolerance is used only if above 0 and below value tolerance.
By default magic Wand is applied to the current active channel tab from the Colormap panel but you can enable Color mode (3 channels image only) by pressing shift key.
